history.narrative: Law 7-47 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 7-92, which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 14, 1987, and September 29, 1987, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on October 16, 1987, it was assigned Act No. 7-80 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
